subtitles.text: I'm Yu Mura, an 18-year-old high school senior from Tokyo, Japan.
I'm currently at a place called Breathsprings.
I often come here with my friends after school.
I have a lot of memories of this place.
So I went there today.
There are many places with beautiful scenery.
I hope I can introduce some of them to you.
I used to play with my friends in my socks when I was in the first grade.
I'm at the top of the mountain.
Around here

My friend's 17th
birthday

This is amazing.

I'll show you.

I'm looking forward to it.
I'm at the dance studio now.
I've been taking ballet lessons since I was a little girl.
I started learning dance after that.

I've always loved to dance and to be on stage.

girl dance and rock dance.

R&B and theater.

I'm a senior in high school and I'm about to start studying for entrance exams.

She recommended me to audition for Sakurazaka.
This was my first encounter with Sakurazaka.

I found out that there were cool performances
or a cute performance

I decided to apply.

There will be many more performances in the future.
I've been thinking a lot about it.
I'd like to talk a little bit about how I'm feeling.
I'm feeling a mixture of happiness and anxiety.
I'm happy because I'm going to be able to work together with everyone else from now on.
I was behind everyone else, and there were many times when I felt impatient and worried.
Even so, I was able to look forward to the future because the other members gave me advice and support.
I am now in a positive frame of mind, so I am really thankful to the members.
To the members of Buddy's, I am really looking forward to meeting many Buddy's in the future.
That's why I will do my best to give you the best performance at the hospitality party coming up soon.
